*** Setting ***
Suite Teardown    Fail    Failure in suite teardown

*** Test Case ***
FTD Passing
    [Documentation]    FAIL
    ...    Teardown of the parent suite failed:
    ...    Failure in suite teardown
    ...
    ...    Also teardown of the parent suite failed:
    ...    Failure in top level suite teardown
    No Operation

FTD Failing
    [Documentation]    FAIL
    ...    Failure in test
    ...
    ...    Also teardown of the parent suite failed:
    ...    Failure in suite teardown
    ...
    ...    Also teardown of the parent suite failed:
    ...    Failure in top level suite teardown
    Fail    Failure in test
